custom.title: Custom network
custom.body: Support for custom networks and/or nodes

setupCustomNetwork.title: Connect to a custom network or node

setup.title: Set up {network, select, IOTA {an} Shimmer {a} Testnet {a} other {a}} {network} profile
setup.body: Select the appropriate method to set up your {network} profile.

setupNew.title: Stvori novi profil
setupNew.body: Možeš odabrati običan softver novčanik ili postaviti hardverski novčanik ukoliko imaš Ledger uređaj.

softwareAccount.title: Stvori softverski profil
softwareAccount.description: Pruža Stronghold datoteku i frazu za oporavak

ledgerAccount.title: Stvori hardverski profil
ledgerAccount.description: Potreban je Ledger Nano S ili Ledger Nano X

setupRecovered.title: Recover {network} profile
setupRecovered.body: Ako imate mnemoničku frazu za oporavak ili Stronghold pričuvnu kopiju, možete ih uvesti ovdje.
setupRecovered.importMnemonicDescription: Unesi svoju mnemoničku frazu od 24 riječi
setupRecovered.importLedgerDescription: Oporavi pomoću Ledger Nano S ili Ledger Nano X uređaja

enterName.title: Create your {network} profile
enterName.body1: Možete stvoriti više korisničkih profila kako biste organizirali svoje novčanike i poboljšali privatnost.

body2.first: Počnimo s imenom tvojeg prvog profila.

setupStrongholdPassword.title: Stvori lozinku
setupStrongholdPassword.body1: Kako biste zaštitili svoja sredstva, treba vam jaka lozinka. Koristite kombinaciju riječi a izbjegavajte uobičajene fraze, imena i datume.
setupStrongholdPassword.body2: Preporučamo vam da zapišete svoju lozinku u Recovery Kit.

setupPinProtection.title: Postavi PIN
setupPinProtection.body1: Unesite PIN od šest znamenki. Za pristup profilu uvijek ćete morati unijeti ovaj PIN.

viewMnemonic.title: Fraza za oporavak
viewMnemonic.body1: Zapišite riječi u svoj Recovery Kit, točnim redoslijedom.
viewMnemonic.body2: Držite ovo privatnim i na sigurnom mjestu.
viewMnemonic.body3: Važno je imati pohranjenu pisanu sigurnosnu kopiju. Računala se često kvare, a datoteke se mogu oštetiti.

verifyMnemonic.title: Potvrdite frazu za oporavak
verifyMnemonic.body: Provjerimo jeste li točno zapisali riječi fraze za oporavak. Odaberite svaku riječ numeriranim redoslijedom. Savjet: možete pritisnuti broj pored riječi na tipkovnici da biste je odabrali.
verifyMnemonic.verifiedBody: Držite ju na sigurnom, izvan dosega drugih.

importMnemonicPhrase.title: Unesi frazu za oporavak
importMnemonicPhrase.body: A recovery phrase is 24 words long, all lower case, with spaces between. This is used to recover existing Bloom profiles.

importStrongholdBackup.title: Uvezi svoju Stronghold sigurnosnu kopiju
importStrongholdBackup.body: Uvezi sigurnosnu kopiju Stronghold datoteke za oporavak profila.

backupPassword.body1: Molimo unesite lozinku za sigurnosnu kopiju.
backupPassword.body2: Ovo je lozinka koju ste postavili kada ste izradili sigurnosnu kopiju.

claimRewards.title: Vaše Shimmer staking nagrade
claimRewards.body: Provjerite jesu li vaše Shimmer staking nagrade točne. Možda ćete morati pretraživati više puta kako bi pronašli puni iznos.

success.title: Shimmer preuzet
success.body: Uspješno ste preuzeli vaše Shimmer tokene.

congratulations.title: Postavljanje profila uskoro dovršeno...
congratulations.body: Vaš novi profil bit će spreman za korištenje nakon uspješnog učitavanja nadzorne ploče.
congratulations.ledgerHint: Nemojte odspajati svoj Ledger uređaj dok se nadzorna ploča uspješno ne učita.

ledgerInstallationGuide.title: Have you installed the {network} app on your Ledger device?
ledgerInstallationGuide.body1: Before you proceed, you must use Ledger Live to find and install the {network} app.
ledgerInstallationGuide.body2: Uvjeri se da je tvoj Ledger na najnovijoj verziji firmwarea. Sve predinstalirane aplikacije trebaju biti na najnovijim verzijama.

connectLedger.title: Connect your Ledger to Bloom
connectLedger.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Bloom, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed.
connectLedger.openApp: Otvorite Shimmer aplikaciju na vašem Ledgeru

theme.title: Tema
theme.advice: If you change your system theme, you may need to restart Bloom to see the effects

currency.title: Valuta
currency.description: Prilagodba konverzije sredstava i promjene grafa vrijednosti

networkStatus.title: Status mreže
networkStatus.description: Prikazuje status nodea s kojim ste trenutno spojeni

exportStronghold.title: Izvezi sigurnosnu kopiju
exportStronghold.description: Izvoz u Stronghold datoteku - potpunu enkriptiranu kopiju vaših novčanika i najnovijih transakcija

appLock.title: Automatic logout
appLock.description: Vrijeme neaktivnosti preostalo do zaključavanja novčanika i odjave iz sustava

strongholdPasswordTimeout.title: Stronghold Timeout
strongholdPasswordTimeout.description: Length of time before your Stronghold password is required again

maxMediaSize.title: Maximum media size
maxMediaSize.description: NFT media with sizes greater than this limit will not be downloaded and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

maxMediaDownloadTime.title: Maximum download time
maxMediaDownloadTime.description: NFT media which take longer than this limit to download will be canceled and a placeholder representing the media type will be displayed instead

refreshNftMedia.title: Refresh NFT media
refreshNftMedia.description: NFT media cached for this account will be deleted and then downloaded again

changePassword.title: Promijenite lozinku
changePassword.description: Lozinka služi za zaštitu novčanika. Upotrijebite jaku lozinku kako biste zaštitili svoja sredstva

changePincode.title: Promijenite PIN kȏd
changePincode.description: Vaš PIN čuva privatnost vaših sredstava i transakcija

walletFinder.title: Pronalazak novčanika
walletFinder.description: Izvršite detaljnu pretragu svojih prethodno korištenih novčanika

hiddenAccounts.title: Skriveni novčanici
hiddenAccounts.description: Odaberite ovu opciju za prikaz novčanika koji su ranije bili skriveni

deleteProfile.title: Izbrišite profil
deleteProfile.description: Brisanje čitavog profila, svih novčanika i povijesti transakcija. Uvjerite se da imate sigurnosnu kopiju

deepLinks.title: Deep linkovi
deepLinks.description: Automatically fill transaction data in Bloom upon clicking a deep link starting with {appProtocol}://

configureNodeList.title: Node konfiguracija
configureNodeList.description: Upravljanje popisom nodeova na koje se spajate
configureNodeList.noNodes: Nema nodeova, nije se moguće povezati s mrežom

localProofOfWork.title: Proof of work
localProofOfWork.description: Complete proof of work locally on your device or outsource to the node

crashReporting.title: Izvješća o padu programa
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Bloom by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs
crashReporting.advice: Please restart the Bloom application to {sendCrashReports, select, true {start sharing crash reports} false {stop sharing crash reports} other {apply this change}}

diagnostics.title: Dijagnostika
diagnostics.description: Vidi informacije o sustavu i aplikaciji

troubleshoot.title: Rješavanje problema
troubleshoot.description: Upotrijebi čarobnjaka za greške u svrhu rješavanja uobičajenih problema

documentation.title: Dokumentacija
documentation.description: Pogledaj dokumentaciju za dubinsko pojašnjenje principa rada

faq.title: Često postavljana pitanja
faq.description: Vidi često postavljana pitanja za pomoć s rješavanjem uobičajenih problema

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Potraži pomoć od IOTA zajednice na Discordu

reportAnIssue.title: Prijavi problem
reportAnIssue.description: Prijavite bug developerima. Prvo provjerite je li ista greška već prijavljena

developerToggle.title: Developer Mode
developerToggle.description: Switch developer mode on to enable more features in experimental state

login.pleaseWait: Molimo pričekajte {time, plural, one {# sekundu} few {# sekunde} other {# sekundi}}
login.incorrectAttempts: {attempts, plural, one {# neuspjeli pokušaj} few {# neuspjela pokušaja} other {# neuspjelih pokušaja}}
login.hintStronghold: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Please log in to update your Stronghold.

errors.aliasAddressWrongFormat: Must be in either hex or Bech32 format

confirmLedgerEvmAddress.title: Confirm EVM address
confirmLedgerEvmAddress.header: We have generated your EVM address

connectLedgerDevice.title: Connect Ledger Device
connectLedgerDevice.body: For your Ledger device to be found by Bloom, please ensure that the official Ledger Live application is closed before following these steps.

requirements.openApp: Open the Ethereum app on your Ledger

removeContact.title: Remove contact
removeContact.body: Are you sure you want to remove this contact?
removeContact.hint: Please note after removing a contact Bloom will show its actual addresses.

removeNetworkAddresses.title: Remove network addresses
removeNetworkAddresses.body: Are you sure you want to remove the contact’s {network} network addresses?
removeNetworkAddresses.hint: Please note after removing a contact’s network addresses Bloom will no longer associate it with them in transactions or activities.

dappsList.title: Connected dApps
dappsList.hint: WalletConnect allows you to connect Bloom with dApps directly or with a connection code.

inputConnectionCode.title: Connect to a dApp
inputConnectionCode.hint: Add new dApps by adding a Wallet Connect code below.

confirmConnection.title: Connect with an application
confirmConnection.hint: A third party service wants to connect with your wallet for the first time. You can choose if you wish to trust this connection.

backup.body: You have not backed up your profile yet! We highly recommend backing this up in case you lose access to this device.

version.body: You are currently using an early version of Bloom.

update.body: A new Bloom update is available today.

gallery.title: Collectibles
gallery.emptyDescription: Deposit or Receive your first collectible now!

details.storageDepositDescription: A refundable deposit required to store your NFT on the Tangle.

proposals.title: Proposals
proposals.successAddAll: {numberOfProposals, select, one {Proposal} other {Proposals}} successfully added to all accounts

details.hintVote: You can not vote on a proposal that is in the announcement phase, voting will open in {time}.

update.title: Update Stronghold
update.loginBody: Your Stronghold's version is out of date. Provide your password to update Stronghold.
update.recoveryBody: The imported Stronghold’s version is out of date, to continue we will need to update the stronghold to the latest version.

updateBackup.loginBody: It's all good now - you're running the latest Stronghold version
updateBackup.recoveryTitle: Stronghold is successfully recovered and updated
updateBackup.recoveryBody: You can now continue setting up your wallet
updateBackup.hint: We highly recommend to delete all previous Stronghold backup files and save a new one

changePassword.hint: Your Stronghold was out of date and has been updated. We recommend that you change your Stronghold password.

enableLedgerBlindSigning.title: Omogući Blind Signing
enableLedgerBlindSigning.info: In order to confirm this transaction you need to enable Blind Signing on your Ledger device.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_1: Connect and unlock your Ledger device
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_3: Press the right button to navigate to Settings, then press both buttons to validate. Your Ledger device displays Blind Signing.
enableLedgerBlindSigning.step_4: Pritisnite oba gumba da bi omogućili Blind Signing transakcije. Uređaj prikazuje Enabled. Gotovo.

storageDeposit.title: Storage deposit
storageDeposit.subtitle: These funds are reserved for storing native assets.

foundryOutputs.title: Foundries
foundryOutputs.subtitle: Reserved for Native Token Foundry storage

storageDepositReturn.title: SDRUC
storageDepositReturn.subtitle: Temporarily locked in Storage Deposit Return

minimizeStorageDeposit.title: Minimize storage deposit
minimizeStorageDeposit.description: Consolidate outputs to minimize your required storage deposit and increase your available balance.

password.title: Potrebna je lozinka
password.subtitle: Za otključavanje novčanika molimo unesite lozinku
password.backup: Unesite lozinku za izvoz sigurnosne kopije

appUpdate.title: Check for updates
appUpdate.updatesDisabled: There are updates available, but in-app upgrade is disabled for your operating system.
appUpdate.latestInstalled: You are running the latest and safest version

backupStronghold.title: Spremi sigurnosnu kopiju Stronghold datoteke
backupStronghold.body: Važno je redovito izrađivati sigurnosne kopije kako biste uvijek imali kopiju svojih novčanika i povijesti transakcija. Izgubite li sigurnosnu kopiju i frazu za oporavak, izgubit ćete pristup svojim sredstvima.

deeplinkAccountSwitch.title: Odaberi novčanik
deeplinkAccountSwitch.body: Upravo ste slijedili deep link. Molimo odaberite novčanik s kojim želite nastaviti.

deeplinkError.title: Neuspješan link
deeplinkError.body: Ovaj link nije uspješan ili je nevažeći. Molimo pokušajte ponovno ili provjerite izvor linka.

deleteAccount.title: Obriši {name}?
deleteAccount.body: Are you sure you want to delete this wallet?
deleteAccount.hint: Note: once deleted, you can restore this wallet by using the "Wallet Finder" in the settings.

externalUrl.title: Open URL in Browser
externalUrl.body: Are you sure you want to open "{url}" in the browser?
externalUrl.hint: This URL is unknown to Bloom. Please double check the URL before opening it.
externalUrl.invalidProtocol: Cannot open URL with invalid protocol

excludeNode.title: Izostavi node
excludeNode.body: Jeste li sigurni da želite izostaviti {url} iz popisa dostupnih nodeova?

unsetAsPrimaryNode.title: Ukloni glavni node
unsetAsPrimaryNode.body: Jeste li sigurni da želite ukloniti {url} kao primarni node?

node.removeConfirmation: Jeste li sigurni da želite ukloniti ovaj node?

deleteProfile.title: Izbrišite profil
deleteProfile.confirmation: Sigurno želiš obrisati ovaj profil? Ova akcija se ne može poništiti.

transaction.surplusIncluded: Ova transakcija sadrži višak iznosa. Provjerite da li je to stvarno iznos koji želite poslati.

walletFinder.title: Pronalazak novčanika
walletFinder.body: Izvršite detaljniju pretragu adresa u potrazi za sredstvima i novčanicima koji vam nedostaju.
walletFinder.searchAgainHint: Da li je vaše stanje ili broj novčanika netočan? Molimo pretražite ponovno dok ne bude prikazano točno stanje.

ledgerNotConnected.title: Spoji svoj Ledger
ledgerNotConnected.notConnected: Spoji svoj Ledger uređaj za nastavak.
ledgerNotConnected.locked: Otključaj svoj Ledger uređaj za nastavak.
ledgerNotConnected.appNotOpen: Open the Shimmer app on your Ledger device to continue.

steps.0: Instaliraj i otvori Ledger Live aplikaciju
steps.1: Uvjeri se da je tvoj Ledger spojen
steps.2: Potražite {legacy} aplikaciju. Možda ćete morati omogućiti Ledger Live developer način rada.
steps.4: Remember that it's important to close Ledger Live before returning to Bloom

ledgerConnectionGuide.title: Savjeti u slučaju da se vaš Ledger ne želi spojiti

steps.0: Pobrini se da Ledger Live aplikacija nije otvorena na tvom računalu
steps.1: Pobrini se da je tvoj Ledger uređaj otključan PIN-om
steps.2: Otvori novu IOTA aplikaciju na svom Ledger uređaju

3.link: Potraži pomoć na službenoj stranici podrške za Ledger

verifyLedgerTransaction.title: Potvrdi transakciju
verifyLedgerTransaction.info: Usporedite i potvrdite podatke o transakciji prikazane na vašem Ledger uređaju s podacima u nastavku.

verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.title: Potvrdi internu transakciju
verifyInternalLedgerTransaction.hint: Sva sredstva ostat će u vašem novčaniku prilikom slanja interne transakcije.

crashReporting.title: Izvješća o padu programa
crashReporting.body: Help the developers improve Bloom by automatically sending diagnostic data when an error or crash occurs. If selected, this will take effect after restarting Bloom.
crashReporting.checkbox: Pošalji izvješća o padu programa IOTA zakladi

signMessage.title: Sign message
signMessage.hint: No balance will be sent to {dappName} in the process of signing this message.
signMessage.warning: dApp cannot be determined. No balance will be sent in the process of signing this message.

legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyBody: We have updated Bloom's Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosBody: We have updated Bloom's Terms of Service.
legalUpdate.privPolicyBody: We have updated Bloom's Privacy Policy.
legalUpdate.tosAndPrivPolicyCheckbox: Pročitao sam i slažem se s Firefly Uvjetima korištenja i Pravilima o privatnosti
legalUpdate.tosCheckbox: Pročitao sam i slažem se s Firefly Uvjetima korištenja
legalUpdate.privPolicyCheckbox: Pročitao sam i slažem se s Firefly Pravilima o privatnosti

tokenInformation.verificationWarning: Ovaj token nije verificiran. Usporedite metapodatke tokena sa podacima na službenoj web stranici relevantnog tima. Verificirajte samo tokene kojima vjerujete.

noAlias.title: Unable to mint
noAlias.description: You must own an alias output to mint native tokens. To continue, please create an alias first

errors.invalidMimetype: Invalid MimeType, check if the file type is supported
errors.quantityTooSmall: Quantity needs to be greater than 0
errors.quantityTooLarge: Quantity needs to be smaller than 64
errors.invalidURI: Invalid URI, please provide a valid URI
errors.notReachable: URI not reachable, unable to check NFT type
errors.royaltiesMustBeJSON: Royalties must be a valid JSON
errors.invalidAddress: Invalid address, must be a valid {networkHrp} address where royalties will be sent to
errors.invalidRoyaltyValue: Invalid value, it must be a numeric decimal representative of the percentage required ie. 0.05
errors.invalidRoyaltyValueSum: Invalid value, the sum of all royalties must be less than or equal to 1'
errors.attributesMustBeJSON: Attributes must be a valid JSON
errors.attributesMustBeArrayOfObjects: Attributes must be an array of objects
errors.attributesInvalidKeys: Invalid key, attributes must have the keys "trait_type" and "value"
errors.attributesInvalidValues: Invalid value, "trait_type" must be a non empty string and "value" must be a non empty string or a number

faucetRequest.title: Zahtjev za tokene s fauceta
faucetRequest.body: Jeste li sigurni da želite zatražiti {token} tokene iz {network} fauceta?

manageVotingPower.title: Manage voting power
manageVotingPower.body: Define your voting power to vote on proposals.
manageVotingPower.hint: All funds that you allocate to voting are locked. In order to make them spendable again, you need to decrease your voting power. This affects all proposals with an active vote.
manageVotingPower.amountZero: Please be aware that setting your voting power to zero will stop all your votes for all proposals you are currently voting on.

addProposal.title: Add proposal
addProposal.body: Please provide the information listed below to add a proposal.
addProposal.addToAllAccounts: Add the proposal to all accounts

editProposal.title: Edit proposal
editProposal.body: Please provide the new url for the node that contains this proposal.

voteForProposal.title: Vote for proposal
voteForProposal.body: You're about to vote for {proposal} proposal.
voteForProposal.hasAbstained: You are abstaining from answering {numberOfQuestions, plural, one {# question} other {# questions}}.
voteForProposal.noVotingPower: You do not have any voting power. Please increase your voting power from the Governance dashboard.

revote.title: Revote on proposals
revote.body: Changing your voting power temporarily stops your votes for all proposals from being counted. Simply click "Revote" to resume voting.
revote.hint: Bloom remembers all of the proposals and answer options you previously voted for.

removeProposal.title: Remove proposal
removeProposal.body: Are you sure you want to remove this proposal?
removeProposal.hint: Please note that removing a proposal during the counting period will stop your votes but won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

stopVoting.title: Stop voting
stopVoting.body: You're about to stop voting for the {proposalName} proposal.
stopVoting.hint: Please note that stopping voting during the counting period won't impact any votes that have already been counted.

nodeAuthRequired.title: Authentication required
nodeAuthRequired.body: This node requires additional authentication. Please fill in the appropriate information.

receiveAddress.title: Receive
receiveAddress.body: Receive tokens, NFTs, and other digital assets to your account address shown below.

confirmRejection.title: Odbij transakciju
confirmRejection.description: Jeste li sigurni da želite odbiti ovu transakciju?
confirmRejection.node: Molimo imajte na umu da odbijanje transakciju samo skriva transakciju iz vašeg sažetka aktivnosti

confirmTokenBurn.title: Burn {assetName}
confirmTokenBurn.hint: Please note that burning a token may free storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible

confirmNftBurn.title: Burn {nftName}
confirmNftBurn.description: Are you sure you want to burn this NFT?
confirmNftBurn.hint: Please note that burning an NFT frees the storage deposit attached to it and is not reversible.

restoreWalletDescription.iota: Migriraj na Chrysalis mrežu ili oporavi postojeći novčanik
restoreWalletDescription.custom: Restore an existing Custom Network profile

refreshNftMedia.title: Refresh NFT media
refreshNftMedia.description: Do you want to delete and re-download all NFT media for this account?

restoreFromStrongholdBackup.wrongProtocolForClaiming: Morate korisiti Stronghold sigurnosnu kopiju temeljenu na IOTA-i da bi preuzeli Shimmer nagrade

profile.duplicate: Profil s ovim imenom već postoji.

password.row: Slova u nizu lako je pogoditi.
password.pattern: Kratke uzorke na tipkovnici lako je pogoditi.
password.names: Uobičajena imena i prezimena je lako pogoditi.
password.sequence: Sekvence znakova poput abc je lako pogoditi.
password.common: Ovo je vrlo često korištena lozinka.
password.similar: Ovo je preslično često korištenoj lozinki.

account.length: Ime novčanika ne smije biti dulje od {length, plural, one {# znaka} few {# znaka} other {# znakova}}.
account.emptyName: Ime profila mora sadržavati najmanje 1 znak.
account.duplicate: Novčanik s ovim imenom već postoji.
account.tilde: Ime profila ne može početi znakom '~'.
account.control: Ime profila ne smije sadržavati Ctrl znak.

tooltips.optionalInput: Ovi neobavezni podaci bit će javno dostupni na pretraživaču i vidljivi svima.

incoming.storageDeposit: Povratni token depozit potreban za pohranu vaše transakcije na Tangle.

incoming.expirationTime: Preuzmite ova sredstva prije isteka vremena ili će biti vraćena pošiljatelju.
incoming.timelockDate: Pošiljatelj je postavio vremensko zaključavanje ovih sredstava. Moći ćete ih potrošiti nakon isteka vremenskog zaključavanja.

incoming.tag: Kratko neobavezno podatkovno polje. Označavanje grupa transakcija može olakšati njihovo traženje.

outgoing.storageDeposit: Depozit za pohranu je povratni depozit potreban za pohranu vaše transakcije na Tangle.
outgoing.expirationTime: Ako primatelj ne preuzme sredstva na vrijeme, tokeni će vam biti vraćeni.
outgoing.timelockDate: Dodali ste vremensko zaključavanje ovoj transakciji. Primatelj neće moći potrošiti ova sredstva sve dok ne istekne vremenska blokada.
outgoing.metadata: Neobavezno podatkovno polje za trajno pohranjivanje podataka na Tangle.
outgoing.tag: Kratko neobavezno podatkovno polje. Označavanje grupa transakcija može olakšati njihovo traženje.

nftMetadata.type: The MimeType of the NFT. e.g. image/png.

mintNativeToken.decimals: IRC30 optional parameter: Number of decimals the token uses (divide the token amount by 10^decimals to get its user representation).
mintNativeToken.description: IRC30 optional parameter: The human-readable description of the token.
mintNativeToken.url: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to more resources about the token like a website or social media page.
mintNativeToken.logoUrl: IRC30 optional parameter: URL pointing to an image resource of the token logo.

mintNftForm.royalties: Optional parameter: An object containing key-value pairs of addresses that map to payout percentages
mintNftForm.issuerName: Optional parameter: The name of the creator
mintNftForm.description: Optional parameter: A description of the NFT
mintNftForm.attributes: Optional parameter: An array of traits and values that define attributes of the NFT
mintNftForm.uri: To create a URI using custom media, first upload your file to IPFS via a storage service (e.g. https://nft.storage/)
mintNftForm.quantity: Optional parameter: The quantity of copies minted with this metadata.

governance.removeProposalWarning: You must stop voting for this proposal before removing it.

outdatedNode.body: The node URL for this proposal is outdated. Please update it to access the latest voting results.

resultsNotAvailable.title: Results not available
resultsNotAvailable.body: The results are no longer available on this proposal's corresponding node. Please update it to access the results.

updateStronghold.profileBadge: Your Stronghold is out of date. Log in to update Stronghold.

tokenIsNotVerified.title: Token is not verified
tokenIsNotVerified.text: Compare the token metadata against the relevant team’s official website. Only verify tokens that you trust.
